sourcesContent:
<app-navbar [enablemodification]="true" [vitrine]="false"></app-navbar>

<div class="header-area header-sticky wow slideInDown" data-wow-duration="0.75s" data-wow-delay="0s">

<ckeditor [disabled]=true [config]="{toolbar: []}"  [editor]="CustomEditor" [(ngModel)]="datawiki"></ckeditor>
